subject: On Behalf of the FACEBOOK Team
body:
On Behalf of the FACEBOOK Team, We are pleased to inform you of the
result of the just concluded Facebook Pandemic Lottery Program (
Covid19) draws held on the (25th of AUGUST 2021) by Facebook Team in
cash Promotion to encourage the usage of Facebook worldwide, your
email and Name was among the 20 Lucky winners who won $900.000.00 USD
Nine Hundred thousand united state dollars each on the the Facebook
Team promotion Award Attached to this email are your winning vital
information which are as follow.
Serial No: (21028646934)
Ref Number: (20652500218/772)
Ticket Number: (9217495204734)
The online draws was Conducted by a random selection of email you
where picked by an Advanced Automated Random Computer ( AARC) search
from the Facebook, Dear winner In other To claim your $900,000.00 USD
contact your claim agent Mrs. Andret Rayford , Email: (
andretrayford11@gmail.com
 ) And forward her the below information to
enable her processed your Facebook Winning Certificate.
FULL NAME:FULL
CONTACT ADDRESS:
MOBILE PHONE NUMBER:
OCCUPATION:
MARITAL STATUS AND AGE:COUNTRY:
TICKET NUMBER:
BATCH NUMBER:
YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS:
Once again a very big congratulations to you and your family once again.
Regards
Facebook Team

subject: Re: On Behalf of the FACEBOOK Team
body:
Dear Facebook Team,

I am delighted to hear about my win in the Facebook Pandemic Lottery Program. However, I would like to confirm a few details before proceeding further.

Could you please provide me with more information about this program and how it was conducted? Also, could you clarify the process of claiming the prize?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Michael
